Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. As Borrego Solar's new Customer Experience Manager, I wanted reach out and check in on how things have been at {!Account.Name}. It's been quite a while since your solar electric system received Permission to Operate on INSERT PTO DATE HERE and I wanted to see how the system has been performing.
I will actually be travelling through Pennsylvania the first week of August and was wondering if you'd be available for a site visit at that time. I'm hoping to stop by, introduce myself, tour the installation and also offer you a token of our appreciation for your business. Would you be free on INSERT TIME AND DATE for us to meet? Please let me know.
Again, on behalf of Borrego Solar I'd like to thank you for your business and your commitment to clean energy. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Cheers, Tommy Sunderland
